scripts.407: eloc build 407.md -o public/407 -t 'Mr Robot E407 Comments'
scripts.408: eloc build 408.md -o public/408 -t 'Mr Robot E408 Comments'
scripts.409: eloc build 409.md -o public/409 -t 'Mr Robot E409 Comments'
scripts.410: eloc build 410.md -o public/410 -t 'Mr Robot E410 Comments' -i *.jpg
scripts.build: eloc build index.md -t 'Mr Robots Comments' && npm run 407 && npm run 408 && npm run 409 && npm run 410
